scripts.install-local: yarn add babel-preset-es2015 babel-preset-react babelify react react-dom stripify --save-dev
scripts.build:client: browserify src/main.js --extension .jsx -t babelify -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > public/js/bundle.js
scripts.build:service-worker: browserify src/ServiceWorker.js -t babelify -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > public/js/sw.js
scripts.dev: yarn watch & browser-sync start --server public --files "public/*.html, public/js/*.js, public/css/*.css" --index="index.html" --browser "google chrome"
